articles.description: 2 new deaths, 160 new cases of COVID-19 according to Maine CDC
articles.content:
Newly released coronavirus cases for Maine(WABI TV)
Maine (WABI) - Two more Mainers died with COVID-19, according to the Maine CDC. One was from Cumberland County, the other from York County.

articles.author: Carolyn Y. Johnson
articles.title: Scientists underestimated the coronavirus — and are racing to keep up with evolution - The Washington Post
articles.description: For most of 2020, scientists weren't very concerned that the coronavirus would evolve. But in a few short months, variants of the virus have become a global preoccupation -- and a potential threat to vaccines.
articles.content:
He just didnt know it would happen quite this fast.
For much of 2020, most people including most experts werent particularly worried about the viruss ability to evolve. SARS-CoV-2 was changing, but … [+11442 chars]
